tagline: Catches the $200 problem before it becomes the $3,000 emergency
pros: Manufacturer-accurate schedules adjusted for real driving conditions
Plain-language explanations that prevent shop upsells
Complete service history tracking that improves resale value
Recall monitoring and warranty expiration alerts
cons: Not a mechanic — tracks and schedules, doesn't diagnose
Needs accurate mileage inputs to keep schedules calibrated
Vehicle-focused only — doesn't cover other equipment or property maintenance

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
